title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 300 - Procedure before the Board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 300 - Procedure before the Board

State Regulations
§ 300.1 - Definitions
§ 300.2 - Independent medical examinations, examiners, entities, and reports made without physical examination
§ 300.3 - Hospital records
§ 300.4 - Hearings before workers' compensation law judges
§ 300.5 - Decisions by workers' compensation law judges
§ 300.6 - Penalties and assessments
§ 300.7 - Hearings
§ 300.8 - Notice of hearings
§ 300.9 - Conduct of hearings
§ 300.10 - Adjournment of hearings
§ 300.11 - Physical examinations
§ 300.12 - Certification of question to the board
§ 300.13 - Administrative review, full board review, and applications for board reconsideration
§ 300.14 - [Repealed]
§ 300.15 - [Repealed]
§ 300.16 - Full board review
§ 300.17 - Notices of retainer, appearance, substitution, and fees of claimant's attorney or licensed representative
§ 300.18 - Record on appeal: contents and service
§ 300.19 - Interest on unpaid awards and unpaid medical bills
§ 300.20 - Proof of facts of existence, relationship and dependency under section 121-a of the workers' compensation law
§ 300.21 - Deductions allowable in determining proceeds of recovery in third-party actions
§ 300.22 - Procedure by carrier, special fund, or TPA following disability event when compensation controverted and when no controversy, including temporary payments of compensation without prejudice
§ 300.23 - Requirements relative to suspension or reduction of compensation benefits
§ 300.24 - Nonschedule adjustments under section 15(5-b) of the workers' compensation law
§ 300.25 - Cases involving serious facial or head disfigurement
§ 300.26 - Direct Deposit
§ 300.27 - Meetings of the board
§ 300.28 - Repealed
§ 300.29 - Modification of distribution of payment in compliance with income execution or income deduction
§ 300.30 - Suspension or modification of application of rules
§ 300.31 - Contracts of insurance
§ 300.32 - Designation of a legally responsible person for a minor claimant
§ 300.33 - Pre-hearing conferences
§ 300.34 - Special expedited hearing process
§ 300.35 - Resumption of benefits upon release from custody
§ 300.36 - Section 32 agreements
§ 300.37 - Case file creation and indexing of claims that may be controverted
§ 300.38 - Controverted claims

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 300

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 2[9], 10[4], 13, 13-a, 13-b, 13-d, 13-g, 13-k, 13-l, 13-m, 13-n, 15 [3][w], 17, 18-c[2], 19, 20, 21-a, 22, 23, 24, 25, 32, 33, 50, 54, 110[5], 117, 123, 137, 141, 142, 218, L. 2007, ch. 6; Volunteer Ambulance Workers'
Benefit Law, §§ 16, 49, 57, 58; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 49, 57, 58;Executive Law, §160-e
ee

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
